trans-unit.source: Provides a mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set.

trans-unit.target: 编写器基对象。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> 类的一个对象，该类为特定设备提供功能信息。

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET, and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 适配器通常通过 ASP.NET，自动构造，并且必须具有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control containing the variable to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 控件的标识符，该控件包含要初始化的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the variable is initialized when the browser renders the form.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器呈现窗体时，变量的初始化值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to encrypt the identifier for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加密控件的标识符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 在浏览器呈现窗体时，添加要初始化的变量。

trans-unit.target: 映射到页上的客户端标识符的所有引用，而不考虑映射相同的回发导致。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.AddFormVariable%2A> method also can scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.AddFormVariable%2A>方法还可以加密出于安全原因必须加密的客户端 Id。

trans-unit.target: 只有可见的控件生成变量。

trans-unit.target: 如果编写器处于分析模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: WML rendering is done in two phases.
trans-unit.target: 在两个阶段完成 WML 呈现。

trans-unit.source: In the first phase, all calls to the renderer are analyzed for correctness.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个阶段中，将的正确性分析对呈现器的所有调用。

trans-unit.source: In the second phase, the rendering is performed.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个阶段中，执行呈现。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include in the post fields the information for all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> interfaces in the form; <see langword="false" /> to include no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发布字段中包含窗体中所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> 接口的信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果不包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> 信息，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the client identifier of the control.

trans-unit.source: If the client identifier of a control is longer than 16 characters, ASP.NET substitutes a uniquely mapped short name.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的客户端标识符的长度超过 16 个字符，ASP.NET 会替换为唯一映射的短名称。

trans-unit.source: All references to the client identifier on the page are mapped, resulting in the same postback regardless of mapping.
trans-unit.target: 映射到页上的客户端标识符的所有引用，而不考虑映射相同的回发导致。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.MapClientIDToShortName%2A> can also scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.MapClientIDToShortName%2A> 此外可加密出于安全原因必须加密的客户端 Id。
